data.text: @jetwoman29 I wish I had words that could help you during this difficult time. Sending prayers for peace & comfort your way.
@jetwoman29 I am so sorry, Lisa. https://t.co/xyZ7cisTtb
@jetwoman29 I’m so sorry! Praying for you! https://t.co/3oRwng7PAN

@jetwoman29 My heart goes out to you and your family! But always remember that God makes no mistakes and he only puts his toughest battles on his strongest people. You got this and may heaven continue to smile upon you!!
@BubbieisNoOne @jetwoman29 Sorry for your loss. That’s a lot to bear in back to back years.

@jetwoman29 I’m so sorry you’re going through this. I can’t imaging the pain you’re in. I saw the pain my mom was in when my dad passed and mine was nothing compared to hers. Sending prayers for peace and a lot of hugs.

@jetwoman29 I am so sorry. 
I am stril attempting to do "normal".  
Talking to someone helps. 
Lost my dad Jan 8th.  My brother 2/19/2021 and my older sister on 7/5/2020.
I'll be praying for you.
